name: UNHOPPY
description:
Unhoppy is a game made for Mini GameJam 106: Frogs. In the game you play as a frog escaping a little girl while he tries to get back home to save his queen.

There's 5 levels

1 ending

With 4 difficulty choices, each one with a different set timer to complete the game: easy (20 min), normal (15 min), hard (10 min) and hardcore (1:33 min).

The game was made with RPG MAKER MV

@SortrosPhoresia (programming and tileset art)

@MustacheSkulls (character art and cutscenes)

@KSSTails (Music)

Special thanks to broby for helping with the script!
